summary: I returned to Trinity Mirror to work on a huge greenfield project (circa 60+ sites), helping with the overall architecture and development of the new digital platform for a company with monthly traffic levels in the tens of millions. The development teams technical stack comprised of full native JavaScript using Express on Node, alongside the templating language of Jade, which was used to translate the back-end data layer into both front-end components and pages. In addition, some of the other technologies used were Grunt, Karma, Mocha, Jade, Browserify, SASS. The list goes on. The project was spread across 10 teams of 10 individuals each, where 2 week sprints, inclusive of 2 releases per week were implemented in an Agile way.
